SIMPLY RAW: Reversing Diabetes in 30 Days, is premiering at the Newport International Film Festival on June 5, 2008 @ 6:00 PM. www.newportfilmfestival.com Cost: $10

Please vote SIMPLY RAW - Audience Choice for Best Documentary!

A transformational story about the lives of 6 diabetics who followed a whole raw food diet for 30 days. The results were unbelievable. By only the 4th day some were off their insulin completely. By the end of the 30 day period their blood sugar had stabilized. Four out of six of these folks had effectively reversed their disease. For some the lifestyle was not so easy. It was a compelling and extraordinary experience for everyone involved. You will recognize many people who are interviewed in the film: Woody Harrelson, Gabriel Cousins MD., Rev. Michael Beckwith, David Wolfe, and Morgan Spurlock of "Super size me".

Following the film enjoy a raw food tasting across the street at The Colony House in Washington Square with the film makers and Kirt Tyson, one of the featured individuals who healed his diabetes in the movie. It will be catered by Rawvolution, Whole foods, Frank Giglio, (former Chef-Instructor from The Tree of Life), and a host of folks from the New England area. Cost: $30
